product

${model.f_comment}

Attribute Help / Comment Format Attributes
uid  Help
The globally unique identifier.
  		uid
max length: 30
allows( printable ) 		pk
required
 
statusCode  Help
The status of this version.\n Draft. New versions always start as a draft and each (master) product can have only one draft at a time.\n Cancelled. Indicates that a draft was cancelled without ever being published.\n Published. When the user is done editing a draft, the draft is published for use. Only one version can be published at a time. When a new version is published, the previously published version (if any) will be archived.\n Archived. A previously published version that has been superceded when a newer version has been published.
  		letterCode
max length: 1
allows( letters ) 		required
 
name  Help
A short, informal display name. Unlike the part number, this value can be changed as needed and is not required to be strictly unique.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable ) 		 
description  Help
A longer multi-line description of the product.
  		notes
max length: 1000
allows( printable ,  whitespace ) 		 
listPrice  Help
The standard list price as published in the standard catalog.
  		money  
discountable  Help
In many cases, a customer-specific discount is applied to the list price in order to determine the actual sell price of the item for a particular order. However, in some cases the item is NOT subject to discounts.\n For example, we may define an product called \"$50 Delayed Install Discount\" with a price -100.00. This product provide a convenient way to give customers a standard discount for delayed installations. But we would NOT want to apply the customer's discount rate to the list price defined for this item.
  		boolean required
 
taxable  Help
Indicate if this product is subject to sales tax. This is generally set to false for labor and servcies, and true for everything else. If a product is some type of package that includes multiple items, then it must be set to taxable if even a single sub-component is taxable.\n Additional rules related to sales tax are checked for each order. If a particular order is flagged as tax exempt, then we will not apply sales tax even if the items are taxable.
  		boolean required
 
cost  Help
An estimate of the total cost of this product. By comparing the sale price and cost of each product sold, we can report an estimated profit.
  		money  
requiresShip  Help
Physical goods generally require that we ship them to the customer. That is, they must be picked, packed, and shipped to the customer. On the other hand, services such as installation or warranty generally do not require shipping.
  		boolean required
 
shipInstruction  Help
Special instructions that need to be displayed to the worker when shipping this product.
  		notes
max length: 1000
allows( printable ,  whitespace ) 		 
pickInstruction  Help
Special instructions that need to be displayed to the worker when picking this product.
  		notes
max length: 1000
allows( printable ,  whitespace ) 		 
networkPortsProduced  Help
The number of network (cat5) ports that this device adds to a network topology. For example, this is used to help warn when an order may be missing a switch, or when the switch doesn't have enough ports for the number of access points.
  		integer required
 
networkPortsConsumed  Help
The number of network (cat5) ports that this device uses/removes from a network topology.
  		integer required
 
poePortsProduced  Help
The number of Power Over Ethernet ports that this adds to a network topology. Note that this may be different from the number of network ports. For example an 8-port switch may only support 3 fully powered PoE ports.
  		integer required
 
poePortsConsumed  Help
The number of Power Over Ethernet ports that this uses in a network topology.
  		integer required
 
vendorPartNumber  Help
The vendor's part number, which may be different from the part number.
  		integer required
 
lockVersion  Help
This is used to coordinate optimistic locking in the database. This is usually not displayed.
  		lockVersion  
statusName  Help
The status of this version.\n Draft. New versions always start as a draft and each (master) product can have only one draft at a time.\n Cancelled. Indicates that a draft was cancelled without ever being published.\n Published. When the user is done editing a draft, the draft is published for use. Only one version can be published at a time. When a new version is published, the previously published version (if any) will be archived.\n Archived. A previously published version that has been superceded when a newer version has been published.
  		name
max length: 50
allows( printable )
